breakfast.name: Avocado Toast
breakfast.description: Two slices of toast with mashed avocado and some seasoning.
steps: Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
breakfast.description: A healthy yogurt bowl topped with fresh berries and a drizzle of honey.
steps: Add Greek yogurt to a bowl.
Top with berries and drizzle honey over it.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Banana and Nuts
breakfast.description: Warm oatmeal topped with banana slices and crunchy nuts.
steps: Cook oats in milk or water as per package instructions.
Top with banana slices and nuts before serving.

diner.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
diner.description: A classic Italian meat sauce served over pasta
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
Brown the ground beef and onions.
Add the tomato sauce and red wine and simmer for 1 hour.
Toss with cooked spaghetti and serve.

diner.name: Chicken Parmesan
diner.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with tomato sauce and mozzarella
steps: Bread chicken breasts with breadcrumbs.
Pan fry until golden brown.
Top with tomato sauce and mozzarella.
Bake until cheese is melted.

diner.name: Caesar Salad
diner.description: Romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons and parmesan
steps: Chop romaine lettuce.
Toss with caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and parmesan.

diner.name: Pasta Alfredo
diner.description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich, creamy parmesan cheese sauce
steps: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Melt butter in a pan.
Add cream and parmesan and cook until thick and creamy.
Toss pasta with sauce.

diner.name: Chicken Fried Rice
diner.description: Rice stir-fried with chicken, vegetables and egg
steps: Cook rice.
Stir fry chicken and vegetables.
Add rice and stir fry.
Scramble egg and mix in.
Season with soy sauce.

desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
desserts.description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with a gooey molten center.
steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C) and grease four ramekins.
In a microwave-safe bowl, melt the butter and chocolate together until smooth.
Stir in the powdered sugar until well combined.
Add the eggs, egg yolks, and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth.
Gently fold in the flour and salt until just combined.
Divide the batter among the ramekins and place them on a baking sheet.
Bake for 12-14 minutes, until the edges are firm but the center is soft.
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates and serve immediately.

desserts.name: Tiramisu
desserts.description: A classic Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and creamy mascarpone cheese.
steps: In a shallow dish, combine the brewed coffee and coffee liqueur.
In a bowl, whisk together the egg yolks and sugar until pale and creamy.
Add the mascarpone cheese and mix until smooth.
In a separate bowl, whip the heavy cream and vanilla extract until soft peaks form.
Fold the whipped cream into the mascarpone mixture gently.
Quickly dip each ladyfinger into the coffee mixture and layer them in a serving dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers. Repeat with another layer.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

desserts.name: Lemon Tart
desserts.description: A refreshing and tangy dessert with a buttery crust and creamy lemon filling.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, combine flour, powdered sugar, butter, and salt. Mix until crumbly.
Add the egg yolk and mix until a dough forms. Press into a tart pan.
Blind bake the crust for 15 minutes until lightly golden.
In another bowl, whisk together granulated sugar, eggs, lemon juice, and lemon zest.
Pour the lemon filling into the baked crust and bake for an additional 20-25 minutes.
Let cool, then dust with powdered sugar before serving.

desserts.name: Pavlova
desserts.description: A light and airy meringue dessert topped with whipped cream and fresh fruits.
ingredients: Fresh fruits (kiwi, strawberries, passion fruit, etc.) for topping
steps: Preheat the oven to 250°F (120°C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, beat the egg whites until soft peaks form.
Gradually add sugar while continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
Add vanilla extract, vinegar, and cornstarch, and mix gently.
Spread the meringue onto the prepared baking sheet, shaping it into a round nest.
Bake for 1 hour, then turn off the oven and let it cool completely inside.
Whip the heavy cream until soft peaks form and spread it over the cooled meringue.
Top with fresh fruits and serve immediately.

SeaFood.name: Seafood Ceviche
SeaFood.description: A refreshing Mexican dish made with fresh seafood, marinated in citrus juices and mixed with vegetables.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: In a large bowl, combine the shrimp and lime juice. Ensure the shrimp are fully submerged.
Cover the bowl and refrigerate for about 30 minutes, until the shrimp turn pink and opaque.
Drain the excess lime juice from the shrimp and add the chopped red onion, cucumber, tomatoes, cilantro, and jalapeño.
Mix well and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips.

SeaFood.name: Thai Shrimp Curry
SeaFood.description: A flavorful and aromatic curry made with shrimp, coconut milk, and Thai spices.
steps: In a large skillet, heat coconut oil over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and ginger, and sauté until fragrant.
Stir in the red curry paste and cook for an additional minute.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add the shrimp, bell peppers, and green beans. Cook for about 5-7 minutes until the shrimp are cooked through.
Stir in the fish sauce and brown sugar. Adjust seasoning to taste.
Serve hot over steamed rice, garnished with fresh basil leaves.

SeaFood.name: Baked Garlic Butter Shrimp
SeaFood.description: A simple yet delicious baked shrimp dish cooked in a garlic butter sauce.
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, mix melted butter, garlic, lemon juice, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Place the shrimp in a baking dish and pour the garlic butter mixture over them.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the shrimp are opaque and cooked through.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve with lemon wedges.

SeaFood.name: Grilled Salmon
SeaFood.description: A healthy and flavorful salmon fillet grilled to perfection.
steps: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
In a bowl, mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Brush the mixture over the salmon fillets.
Place the salmon on the grill and cook for about 5-6 minutes per side, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork.
Garnish with lemon slices before serving.

FastFood.name: Cheese Pizza
FastFood.description: Crispy crust with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese
steps: Stretch dough into rounds.
Top with sauce and cheese.
Bake until crust is crispy and cheese melted.

FastFood.name: Hamburger
FastFood.description: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion and cheese on a bun
steps: Form ground beef into patties and grill.
Toast buns.
Place patty on bun and top with lettuce, tomato, onion and cheese.

Drinks.name: Orange Juice
Drinks.description: A refreshing and fresh juice made from ripe oranges.
steps: Wash the oranges thoroughly under running water.
Use a juicer to extract the juice from the oranges until you have fresh juice.
If you don't have a juicer, you can use a blender, but be sure to strain the juice to remove any pulp.
If you prefer your juice sweeter, you can add sugar to taste. Mix well until the sugar dissolves.
Add lemon juice to enhance the flavor, and mix well.
Serve the juice in glasses with ice as desired.

Drinks.name: Mango Smoothie
Drinks.description: A creamy and refreshing smoothie made with ripe mangoes.
steps: Peel and chop the mangoes and banana.
In a blender, combine the mangoes, banana, yogurt, milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth. If the mixture is too thick, add more milk to reach your desired consistency.
Add ice cubes and blend again until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

Drinks.name: Strawberry Smoothie
Drinks.description: A delightful smoothie made with fresh strawberries and yogurt.
steps: Wash the strawberries and remove the stems.
In a blender, combine the strawberries, banana, yogurt, milk, and honey.
Blend until smooth. Adjust the thickness by adding more milk if necessary.
Add ice cubes and blend again until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve cold.

Drinks.name: Avocado Smoothie
Drinks.description: A creamy and nutritious smoothie made with ripe avocados.
steps: Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a blender.
Add the banana, almond milk, and honey to the blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy. If the smoothie is too thick, add more milk to thin it out.
Add ice cubes and blend again until smooth.
Serve in a glass and enjoy!
